details: Contains a soporific active principle. Obstinate retention of urine, throbbing headaches and heartburn, have been produced by celery. Swelling of throat, face, and hands. Rheumatic pain in muscles of neck also in sacrum. Growing pains. Hungry for apples. Dysmenorrhoea, with sharp, short pains, better flexing legs.

Head: Itching in eyes
Depressed; energetic; feeling of fidgets; cannot sleep from thinking
Itching and smarting in inner canthus of left eye
Headache; better eating
Eyeballs feel sunken
Respiratory: INTENSE CONSTRICTION OVER STERNUM, with drawing feeling through to back on lying down
Abdomen: Sore; sharp sticking pain as if stool was coming on; diarrhoea, sharp pain in left iliac region going over to right
Sleep: Not fatigued from loss of sleep
Wakes from 1 to three AM Eating does not help sleep
Female: Sharp sticking pains in both ovarian regions, left, better bending over, by lying on left side, WITH LEGS FLEXED; nipples tender

name: Apium graveolens
